code: import axios from"axios/index";import cookie from'react-cookies';import ConfigCookie from'./config/ConfigCookie';axios.interceptors.request.use(function(cfg){cfg.timeout=10000;if(!cfg.params){cfg.params={};}var accessToken=cookie.load(ConfigCookie.getTokenKey());if(accessToken){cfg.headers['Authorization']=accessToken||'';return cfg;}return cfg;},function(error){return Promise.reject(error);});export default axios;
